item.description:
Hey all--

I've been along for one or two meetup scoots, and am hoping that all that's keeping this group from being more active is a few good, concrete proposals for a ride.

So, anyone up for a leisurely jaunt to a summertime snack shack in Sherborn?

Here's the destination:
http://candlfrosty.com/

Here's the route I'm planning on using:
http://goo.gl/maps/uehq7

50cc scooters are definitely welcome, but the end of this ride is a little speedy... it'd be better if your 50cc scoot can get close to 40mph. If not though, no big deal. Certainly, bigger scoots are welcome.

Meet at 10am in the giant parking lot in Newton Center (near JP Licks and Johnny's Luncheonette), roll out around 10:15am.

If it's raining, I'll delay this ride until 9/8. I'll make the call (and post it here) by 8am on the day of the ride.
item.name: Ride from Newton Center to Lunch at C&L Frosty in Sherborn
